title: Ep. 141 - Eric Sprott Unplugged
itunes:title: Eric Sprott Unplugged
description: Eric Sprott, one of the best resource investors in the world, says gold and silver are the best place for investors to have their money right now. Eric also sees natural gas prices moving higher as the clean energy makes its way into cars.
content:encoded: Eric Sprott, one of the best resource investors in the world, says gold and silver are the best place for investors to have their money right now. Eric also sees natural gas prices moving higher as the clean energy makes its way into cars.
